gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 115, Hornets 91
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks defeated the Hornets, 115-91, and improve to 10-7 on the year and 3-1 in East B play. Julius Randle led the Knicks with 25 points, 20 rebounds, and five assists as Immanuel Quickley added 23 points. Brandon Miller led the Hornets with 18 points, three rebounds, and two assists. The Hornets move to 5-11 on year and 1-3 in East B play.
